response.overview: Enter, if you dare, a world of exquisite fantasy and torrential darkness. Forget all that you know about reality and allow yourself to journey with us to a world that exists in the dark side of man's nature. Imagine, if you will, a distant and barren world, in a realm of darkness beyond time and space. Imagine now a beautiful Demoness whose sexual prowess can bring any man to his knees from the mere scent of her body. Imagine that devastating beauty prowling the universe in search of victims for her irresistible sexual powers. Now imagine a legion of protectors who are our only defense from this mesmerizing goddess of lust and destruction. Imagine her capture and her confinement in a dungeon hidden beyond the stars in the furthest reaches of outer space.
response.title: Hell
